item.title: Newsletter
item.description: Get updates from the hexdevs team right in your inbox We don’t send spam and you can unsubscribe at any time. We will send you a couple of emails per month to let you know about new blog posts, podcast episodes, next events, lives, workshops, watch parties. See you inside ðŸ“¥
